Jan 25 (Reuters) - Amazon.com Inc AMZN.O:

  • AMAZON SAYS TO EXPAND AMAZON GO STORE PORTFOLIO WITH INTRODUCTION OF NEW AMAZON GO FORMAT THAT’S CLOSER TO HOME FOR CUSTOMERS - SPOKESPERSON

  • AMAZON SAYS AMAZON GO PLANS TO ALSO BRING NEW AMAZON GO STORE FORMAT TO LA-METRO AREA IN COMING MONTHS - SPOKESPERSON

  • AMAZON SAYS NEW AMAZON GO STORE FORMAT WILL FEATURE JUST WALK OUT SHOPPING EXPERIENCE - SPOKESPERSON

  • AMAZON SAYS INTRODUCTION OF NEW AMAZON GO FORMAT STARTING IN MILL CREEK, WA IN COMING MONTHS - SPOKESPERSON


Further company coverage: AMZN.O
